mapper.insert: insert into loan_bank (creator_id, create_time, editor_id, edit_time, status, flag, code, name, image, show_state, serial_number) values (#{creatorId}, #{createTime}, #{editorId}, #{editTime}, #{status}, #{flag}, #{code}, #{name}, #{image}, #{showState}, #{serialNumber})
mapper.update: update loan_bank set status = false, flag = false where id = #{id}
mapper.sql: id, code, name, image, show_state, serial_number
mapper.select: select from loan_bank where status = true and flag = true and id = #{id}
